title: The Giro d'Italia newsletter
content:
At Rouleur, we're strong believers that the Giro d'Italia is the most beautiful of the Grand Tours, and so we're thrilled to have teamed up with Garmin to bring you a dedicated daily newsletter.

The Giro daily newsletter will include all the talking points, our predictions for the coming days, longform features around the Giro and snippets of history from the race.

If you’re already a Chronicle subscriber, you’ll receive our daily Giro d'Italia newsletter, otherwise please sign up below.
author: Miles Baker-Clarke
